title: Bug 120216Group dialog should be showed even dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shownExpected behavior As part of the template requirements, we dont want UI to do the validation.
EB: Bug 120216Group dialog should be showed even dataset is not set.Add a table report item do not set the data set try creating a new table group. User should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR: Bug 120216Group dialog should be showed even dataset is not set.Add a table report item do not set the data set try creating a new table group.
